FoodStore.name: Inside the Foodshop
FoodStore.description:
You entered the store
 This place is filled with food... you hear someone shout: hey fatty! looking for a cream cake?. but you arent discouraged on your mission for creamed cakey goodness

WeaponStore.name: Inside the Weaponshop
WeaponStore.description:
You entered the store of weapons.
 Youre wondering how you will handle these... you managed to cut yourself with a spoon the other day.

PotionStore.name: Inside the Potionshop
PotionStore.description:
Potion Store!
 Where any bottled liquid can be sold if you put a label on it
 you see the shop keeper in the back room, he zips up his pants and places a freshly filled bottle on the shelf before walking towards you

ArmorStore.name: Inside the Armorshop
ArmorStore.description:
You enter the armor store
 These items look dull and preowned, like everything else you have
